summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.text: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer and Game Creator with extensive experience in web development and game design. My expertise spans across modern web technologies, including Angular, React, and .NET, as well as game development using Unity and various game engines.

focus.text: I focus on crafting clean, responsive interfaces and building reliable full-stack systems. I enjoy turning complex ideas into polished experiences that feel fast and intuitive.

experience.title: Experience & Expertise
experience.text1: With a strong background in both enterprise software development and independent game creation, I bring a unique perspective to every project. My experience includes developing scalable web applications, creating engaging user interfaces, and building games.
experience.text2: I'm particularly proud of my indie game "Aria Disconnect," a Metroidvania-style action-adventure game with a cyberpunk theme, showcasing my abilities in game design, programming, and project management.

game.description: Aria Disconnect is an action-adventure Metroidvania with a cyberpunk theme. You are going to follow Heri's journey to recover from the digital nightmare he has become stuck inside. The year is 2082, you are hooked to a machine, and there is only one way out, to disconnect.

features.title: Key Features
features.item6: üìñ Story about life and death, told mostly without words

spinMaster.title: Spin Master
spinMaster.description: A fast, arcade-style spinner game with simple controls. Built in Pixi.js
